name: @limechain/local-hedera
description: Developer tooling for running Local Hedera Network (Consensus + Mirror Nodes).
author: LimeChain

scripts.postinstall: git clone git@github.com:hashgraph/hedera-network-e2e.git && cd hedera-network-e2e && git reset --hard HEAD && sed -i 's/JAVA_OPTS/#JAVA_OPTS/' .env && docker-compose build
